mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_user where user_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user(user_id, user_pass,user_name,user_birth, user_phone, user_email,user_gender, user_grade, user_wcnt, interest, joindate) values(#{id},#{pswd1},#{name},#{birth},#{mobile},#{email},#{gender},#{user_grade},#{user_wcnt},#{interest},sysdate())
